name: lexical
description: Lexical is an extensible text editor framework that provides excellent reliability, accessible and performance.

scripts.git: cd ../.. && git add . && git commit -m "Bump version" && git push
scripts.bump: run-p bump:debug bump:nu bump:extension bump:core bump:calendar20000 bump:styles bump:core bump:phone bump:fbase bump:admin bump:bazi bump:setting bump:qmdj bump:clothing bump:zeri bump:iching bump:compass bump:menu bump:calendar bump:bazip bump:app
scripts.ver: powershell -Command "(Get-Content -Raw -Path package.json | ConvertFrom-Json).version | Out-File -Encoding utf8 ../../public/version.txt; (Get-Content -Raw -Path package.json | ConvertFrom-Json).version | Out-File -Encoding utf8 ./build/version.txt"
scripts.build: pnpm git && pnpm bump && pnpm ver &&  pnpm build:menu &&  pnpm build:vite
scripts.clean:nm: for /d /r . %d in (node_modules) do @if exist "%d" (echo Removing "%d" & rd /s /q "%d")
